meanings: slap a person[someone in the face] with a smile
A smiling house will have good fortune
You cannot spit on a smiling face, A soft answer turns away wrath

vlive.korean: [두 번째 해고 위기] 아니 웃어도 안 돼? [At the risk of being fired again] Can't I laugh? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.27 세봉이의 상상은 현실이 된다 #1
vlive.english: [At the risk of being fired again] Can't I laugh?

vlive.korean: 아니 너 안 웃어도 귀여워. No, you're cute even when you don't smile. 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : (여자)아이들 - I-TALK #15 : '한(一)' 첫방 비하인드
vlive.english: No, you're cute even when you don't smile.

vlive.korean: 5, 6... - 그러면 내가 하면서 너희들은 웃어도 돼? 5, 6... - When I do it, can you guys laugh? 듣기 View video NCT : 💚NCT127 2주년훈장🎖수여식💚에 NCTzen이 초대되었습니다
vlive.english: 5, 6... - When I do it, can you guys laugh?

vlive.korean: [긴장 터지는 빵민이...] 그냥 웃어도 그냥 웃는 게 아닌 것 같아. [Young Min feels nervous] It doesn't seem like she's just laughing. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 7부_ep.6 프로美낭낭! 포피즈 화보촬영에 도전하다!
vlive.english: [Young Min feels nervous] It doesn't seem like she's just laughing.

vlive.korean: 전 웃어도 돼요? - 네. May I smile? - Yes. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] GOT7 X EATING SHOW - GOT7의 같이먹어요!
